item.title: Uncertainty over economy, tariffs forces retailers to be cautious on holiday hiring
item.description: Rising tariff costs and other economic factors are forcing retailers to pull back or even delay their plans to hire seasonal workers

item.title: China shows no sign of backing down; calls for US to withdraw tariff threat
item.description: China has called for the U.S. to withdraw a new threat of a 100% tariff and other export control measures

item.title: Fast trains collide in Slovakia, injuring dozens, with 2 in critical condition
item.description: Two fast trains have collided in eastern Slovakia, injuring dozens of passengers

item.title: Nobel economics prize goes to 3 for explaining innovation-driven economic growth
item.description: Joel Mokyr, Philippe Aghion and Peter Howitt have won the Nobel memorial prize in economics for explaining innovation-driven economic growth

item.title: Madagascar president to make a speech after soldiers turned against the government in apparent coup
item.description: Madagascar President Andry Rajoelina is due to make a speech on national television after an elite military unit turned against the government in an a...
